Structs/SkelpoMetric/Timer.html#/s:13Ske.name: lock()
Structs/SkelpoMetric/Timer.html#/s:13Ske.abstract: Locks the metric’s event to stop mutations. so it can be aggregated.

Structs/SkelpoMetric/Guage.html#/s:13Ske.name: lock()
Structs/SkelpoMetric/Guage.html#/s:13Ske.abstract: Locks the metric’s event to stop mutations. so it can be aggregated.

Structs/SkelpoMetric/Recorder.html#/s:13.name: lock()
Structs/SkelpoMetric/Recorder.html#/s:13.abstract: Locks the metric’s event to stop mutations. so it can be aggregated.

Structs/SkelpoMetric/Counter.html#/s:13S.name: lock()
Structs/SkelpoMetric/Counter.html#/s:13S.abstract: Locks the metric’s event to stop mutations. so it can be aggregated.

Structs/SkelpoMetric.html#/s:13SkelpoMet.name: config
Structs/SkelpoMetric.html#/s:13SkelpoMet.abstract: The configuration for the metric factory with the URL for the API at

Structs/SkelpoMetric/Counter.html.name: Counter
Structs/SkelpoMetric/Counter.html.abstract: A CounterHandler that tracks a value that can be stored as a metric by SwiftMetrics.

Structs/SkelpoMetric/Recorder.html.name: Recorder
Structs/SkelpoMetric/Recorder.html.abstract: A RecorderHandler that records aggregate values that can be stored as a metric by SwiftMetrics.

Structs/SkelpoMetric/Guage.html.name: Guage
Structs/SkelpoMetric/Guage.html.abstract: A RecorderHandler that records a single value that can be stored as a metric by SwiftMetrics.

Structs/SkelpoMetric/Timer.html.name: Timer
Structs/SkelpoMetric/Timer.html.abstract: A TimerHandler that records a list of durations that can be stored as a metric by SwiftMetrics.

Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.name: urlVariable
Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.abstract: The name of the environment variable that the url property

Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.name: keyVariable
Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.abstract: The name of the environment variable that the key property

Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.name: url
Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.abstract: The root URL for the API to save the metrics to.

Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.name: key
Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.abstract: The key for the API that the metrics will be saved to.

Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.name: init()
Structs/Config.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics6C.abstract: Creates a new Config instance from environment variables.

Structs/Error.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Er.name: identifier
Structs/Error.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Er.abstract: The identifier for the error that is machine readable.

Structs/Error.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Er.name: reason
Structs/Error.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Er.abstract: The human readable reason for the error.

Structs/Event.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Ev.name: quantity
Structs/Event.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Ev.abstract: The number of the given event that have occured.

Structs/Event.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Ev.name: date
Structs/Event.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Ev.abstract: The date that the event occured at.

Structs/Event.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Ev.name: metric
Structs/Event.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Ev.abstract: The metric that is connected to the given event.

Structs/Event.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Ev.name: type
Structs/Event.html#/s:13SkelpoMetrics5Ev.abstract: The type that describes what event occured.

Structs/Event.html.name: Event
Structs/Event.html.abstract: An event that occurs at a given point in time. This is the model used by the Skelpo metric API.

Structs/Error.html.name: Error
Structs/Error.html.abstract: An error that occurs from a failed operation in the SkelpoMetrics API.

Structs/SkelpoMetric.html.name: SkelpoMetric
Structs/SkelpoMetric.html.abstract: The MetricFactory instance that should be registered to store metric information

Enums/Metric/Name.html.name: Name
Enums/Metric/Name.html.abstract: The names of the metric cases without the associated types.

Enums/Metric.html.name: Metric
Enums/Metric.html.abstract: A recorded metric from a SkelpoMetric metric handler type.
